person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Member of Parliament Tony Marlow said the resignation of the chancellor of the exchequer was the only way to make the Conservatives electable in a general election which must take place by May next year .

Let's think step by step.

1. Member of Parliament (Tony Marlow)
2. Chancellor of the Exchequer (not named in the paragraph, but implied to be the person who resigned)
3. Conservatives (not a person, but a political party)
4. General election (not a person, but an event)
5. May (not a person, but a month mentioned as the deadline for the election)

So, the identified "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Member of Parliament Tony Marlow
2. Chancellor of the Exchequer (implied)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Member of Parliament Tony Marlow
2. Chancellor of the Exchequer (implied)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|

| Chancellor of the Exchequer (implied) |

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Member of Parliament Tony Marlow said the resignation of the chancellor of the exchequer was the only way to make the Conservatives electable in a general election which must take place by May next year .

Let's think step by step.

1. Member of Parliament (M.P.) - Tony Marlow is an individual who is a member of the Parliament of the United Kingdom.
2. Conservatives - This is a political party in the United Kingdom.
3. General election - A general election is a process for choosing the members of a parliament or other legislative body.
4. Chancellor of the Exchequer - This is a position in the British government, specifically the head of Her Majesty's Treasury and the second most senior minister in the Cabinet, after the Prime Minister.

So, the organizations mentioned in the paragraph are:
1. Conservatives (political party)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
